main.name: Atul Kumar Awasthi
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Atul. I have 1 year of experience as a Front-end developer. Curious to explore the web and work as Full-stack dev. I am a quick learner and hope to achieve my goals through sheer hard work. I'm curious by nature and have a thirst for knowledge and like to learn more and more at any point in time. I also keep upgrading my skill-set, which I leverage to take myself to newer heights.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed a cutting-edge survey platform that gleaned insights from both rural and urban areas. Leveraged React JS, Redux, and Material-UI to craft an engaging user interface while seamlessly integrating APIs. Engineered backend APIs using Node JS, with data storage facilitated by a combination of Mongo DB and Scylla DB. Orchestrated production deployments using AWS and Jenkins, ensuring a robust and scalable application.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building a parenting website that provides content directly to consumers (D2C) that helps to make Mama's lifestyle more accessible and helps to diagnose their baby's health in the initial phase. Used Razzlejs to build the web and Vitest for unit testing to improve the SEO performance and web efficiency by 25%. Here responsible for creating the web view infrastructure for millions of users to get a seamless experience with the minimum response time at the leading content-providing parenting company.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building on the client's live website, in which adding some features in the live chatBox module, customized responsive UI. Add a feature that improves the SEO performance and user view. Handling server-side rendering (SSR) using express.js. Handle AWS server for deploying code on production and development server.

projects.title: NetFlix Entertainment app (React JS, Redux, Tailwind CSS)
Podify music app (React JS, Redux Vite, Tailwind CSS)
E-commerce site (React JS, Next Js, Redux, NextAuth, Tailwind css)
Slack-on (React JS, Next Js, Styled Components, Firebase-db)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
